content: Aliens came to Earth many years ago to share all their knowledge with the earthlings, but at a certain point they decided to go away and didn't come back again.
translations: ita:Gli alieni erano venuti sulla Terra, moltissimi anni fa, per condividere coi terrestri tutta la loro conoscenza, ma a un
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by adamtrousers (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
